QuestData.Title: Agamaggan's Charge
QuestData.Description: Listen closely, mortal.$B$BThe Quilboar are my children. My blood runs deep in these lands.$B$BCharlga Razorflank has steered my children into darkness, driven into insanity by the Scourge.$B$BSlay her, $n. Slay her and open my childrens' eyes.$B$BGive the Quilboar the chance to return to their noble roots. Let them once more earn my blessing.$B$BBring me her heart!!!$B$B
QuestData.CompletionText: <The Spirit of Agamaggan stares at you patiently.>
QuestData.RewardText: Take this gift. You have earned my blessing this day.
